statements: DELETE FROM SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL' AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 50 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM stock_price_movements WHERE movement = 'down' AND stock_name = 'AAPL' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM stock_price_movements WHERE analysis_id = (SELECT analysis_id FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5);
DELETE FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 AND volume < 5000;
